title: Shehbaz Sharif appoints Jaffar Khan Mandokhel as PML(N) Balochistan President
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 2 (APP): President Pakistan Muslim League (N), Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday appointed Jaffar Khan Mandokhel as President of PML(N) Balochistan.
PML(N) Quaid Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif had nominated Jaffar Khan Mandokhel as President of PML(N) Balochistan in consultation with the party.
The Prime Minister congratulated Jaffar Khan Mandokhel, who called on him here, on getting the new responsibility and expressed good wishes for him.
He hoped that Jaffar Khan Mandokhel will organize the PML(N) well in Balochistan and run the party affairs in a better way.
Former Prime Minister and Member of the National Assembly (MNA) Shahid Khaqan Abbasi and Minister for Education Rana Tanvir Hussain were also present in the meeting.
